doc.previous: Tapie filed for personal bankruptcy in 1994 He was the object of several lawsuits notably related to match fixing at the football club During 1997 he served 6 months of an 18 month prison sentence in La Sant prison in Paris
doc.after: In 1994 combined with FIFA Youth Group SOS Children s Villages became the main beneficiary  In 1997 Adidas AG acquired the Salomon Group who specialized in ski wear and its official corporate name was changed to Adidas Salomon AG With this acquisition Adidas also acquired the Taylormade Golf company and Maxfli which allowed them to compete with Nike Golf
